Introduction Data stream is the source of continuous
data collected from sensor network, satellite...
The amount of data is unlimited, which cannot be entirely stored, and should be processed quickly.
Introduction(motivation) The evolution of data clusters can be used
to analyze the trends of the continuous data streams.
Each individual data cluster represents the distinct group of the data.
Introduction(motivation) The evolving behavior of each cluster is
treated as a movement of the cluster
We refer significant movements to movement events.
